reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress great for fancy evening events and appreciate its flattering fit, comfort, and stretchy material. The dress receives positive feedback for its appearance, with one customer noting it's perfect for Valentine's date night. However, the material quality receives mixed reviews, with several customers describing it as somewhat cheap, and the sparkles are criticized for being sparse and scattered.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Fit well
items.body: Very pretty dress! Super comfortable and photographs well. Excited to wear again. I sized down to a small for a better fit. I’m short 5’2 and had room for heels but flats worked well without being too long. Read more
items.author: Martin4

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable and sexy!
items.body: I love this dress! I bought this very last minute for my law school “prom” and I’m so glad I did. I ordered a M and L, and the medium fit the best. I am 150-160lbs, 5ft 5in with athletic build, wide hips and B-cup. The dress was soft and the sparkles did not fall off at all. The straps held very well and the length was perfect with heels. The color and fit are stunning and I was very comfortable. I bloat a ton and I felt so sexy in this dress and I didn’t feel like my stomach was on display. Overall, a great dress for a fancy evening! Read more
items.author: Carter

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Cute but the strands can be torn easily
items.body: Cute but the strands are delicate. Read more
items.author: Stephanie orozco

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exactly the picture
items.body: This dress is definitely beautiful. I loved. The quality is very good; it's very comfortable and elegant. Read more
items.author: Liliana Castaño

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap material not worth $50
items.body: Beautiful dress but very cheap material, the glitter falls off as you’re taking it out of the package and it doesn’t seem to hold well possibly a 1-2 time use not sure how it would hold up washing it. As for the parts you can tie the string is very thin and fragile. Very stretchy material but wouldn’t recommend for the price. Read more
items.author: Ana barraza

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sexy, Classy, Gorgeous
items.body: The media could not be loaded. This dress gives sexy, classy, not doing too much, but enough to get all the attention. I wore it to a Christmas gala and got tons of compliments Look/Fit: I’m 5’2 125 pounds and the dress fit me well. I would have preferred if it was just a tad bit tighter on me for that “fit like a glove” effect, but it didn’t take away from the overall look. It also stops at my ankles Quality: The fabric is thin and thick enough, not see through, and you won’t leave a trail of sparkles wherever you walk I’d say buy the dress, and think about getting it altered if you cared to. Read more
items.author: Zikora Ifunanya

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Okay dress
items.body: It was okay. The dress came in with some straps broken and somewhat cheap material. I don’t end up wearing because it came late too Read more
items.author: Tiffany ES

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars 10/10 loved it
items.body: i loved the dress!! pretty stretchy! great material ! the sizing was perfect! it looks exactly like the picture Read more
items.author: Jachiya Duffy

short_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Formal Split Maxi Evening is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

This piece transitions well from daytime plans to evening events with a quick change of shoes and a small bag or clutch.

To keep it looking sharp, follow the care label first and avoid high heat when drying or steaming if the material is sensitive.

long_description:
Womens Maxi Dress Cocktail Bodycon Formal Split Maxi Evening is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Wine, Navy, Black. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
